data.title: Rude service.
data.text: Went in thinking it will be an enjoyable experience, bought a cigar, they guy was rude, unhelpful and would rather watch videos on his laptop. I left after smoking the cigar and I said bye and thanks and he didn't even acknowledge me. Won't be going back and I don't recommend it to anyone.

data.title: Cigars and a smoking lounge
data.text: if you are traveling and looking for a place to buy and smoke a great cigar, your search has ended. Located in Meridian, it is a short car/taxi ride from anyplace in the greater Boise area. Good selection of Cigars at a reasonable price, and a comfortable smoking lounge to enjoy your selection. Lounge is usually populated with local customers, but they are welcoming to visitors from out of town and you will enjoy the conversation, or sporting event on the big screen TV. A home away from home. Have a smoke and end they day on a high note. Great restaurant right next store at Rick's Press Room  listed here on Travel Advisor
